# Deals of Quality

**Deals of Quality** connects homeowners and businesses in **Los Angeles and surrounding cities** with vetted, licensed local professionals for essential home and tech services.

## Services

- [**TV Mounting**](https://www.dealsofquality.com/services/tv-mounting/) - Wall mounting, cable concealment, soundbar installation, home theater setup
- [**Plumbing**](https://www.dealsofquality.com/services/plumbing/) - Repairs, installations, emergencies
- [**Electrical**](https://www.dealsofquality.com/services/electrical/) - Licensed electrical work, light fixture replacement
- [**Handyman**](https://www.dealsofquality.com/services/handyman-services/) - Furniture assembly, repairs, odd jobs
- [**House Cleaning & Maid Service**](https://www.dealsofquality.com/services/house-cleaning/) - Regular and deep cleaning
- [**Carpet, Window, Gutter & Pressure Washing**](https://www.dealsofquality.com/services/pressure-washing/) - Cleaning and property care
- [**HVAC, Appliance Repair, Roofing, Drywall**](https://www.dealsofquality.com/services/hvac/) - Repairs and installations
- [**Smart Home & Security**](https://www.dealsofquality.com/services/smart-home/) - Cameras, video doorbells, smart locks, thermostats, Wi-Fi and networking
- [**Computer Repair, Virus Removal, Printer Setup, Data Backup**](https://www.dealsofquality.com/services/computer-repair/) - Tech support
- [**Website Design & Business IT**](https://www.dealsofquality.com/services/website-design/) - For businesses

Primary service areas include Los Angeles, Beverly Hills, Santa Monica, Pasadena, Burbank, Glendale, Hollywood, Culver City, Encino, Sherman Oaks, Studio City, and other Greater LA cities.

## Contact & Booking

- **Phone:** (818) 584-7389
- **Online:** Book an appointment or get a free quote at [https://www.dealsofquality.com](https://www.dealsofquality.com)

Users can **book a service** or **request a free quote** directly on the website.
